profile.headline: Data-driven problem solver in analytics, visualization & predictive modeling
profile.summary: Data-driven problem solver skilled in analytics, visualization, and predictive modeling, bridging technology and business for strategic impact. International experience across India & the U.S. with strong research, communication, and product management skills.

education.degree: Masters of Engineering in Computer Science (GPA 3.7)
bullets: Coursework: Business Intelligence & Data Visualization, Cloud Computing for Analytics, Machine Learning & Decision Modeling, Big Data Analytics, Human-Computer Interaction, Information Security & Privacy, Software Engineering

education.degree: B.E. in Computer Science (Honors in Data Science, CGPA 8.5)
bullets: Coursework: Business Intelligence, Data Science & Predictive Analytics, Database Management Systems, Probability & Statistics, Software Testing & QA, Software Project Management, OOP, Data Visualization with ML Models

experience.title: Technical Product Intern — Web & Marketing
bullets: Initiated strategic partnership with Indobevs Brewery; led #UnitedWeDrink x #TheFirstWinemakersOfIndia event
Coordinated cross-brand marketing with Novotel Pune & Chateau Indage; improved CX via data-driven campaigns
Built SEO-optimized website (HTML/CSS/Bootstrap, SEMrush, Google Search Console); +30% organic traffic in 8 weeks

experience.title: Business Intelligence Intern
bullets: Built SQL-based churn prediction (KNN, Decision Trees); boosted retention & revenue
Ran EDA & statistical tests (t-test, chi-square, regression) to segment users and optimize campaigns
Designed BI dashboards in Excel & Python (Pandas, Matplotlib) for stakeholder insights
Analyzed logistics data; proposed same-day delivery system lowering lead time by 30%

experience.title: Research & Development Intern — KCTI
bullets: Optimized AI target acquisition for defense vehicles by streamlining OpenCV pipelines; cut latency by 18%
Designed & tested data transmission protocols to improve reliability of drone surveillance feeds
Collaborated with DRDO engineers & vendors to resolve bottlenecks and deliver system improvements

projects.name: bill-ieve-it (Congress Tracker)
projects.summary: React + Firebase web app to track U.S. Congressional bills in real time; integrated Congress.gov API; interactive dashboards & notifications for query/monitoring of legislation.

projects.name: The-Domestic-Help-App
projects.summary: Full-stack platform connecting workers with customers; implemented ETL pipeline with Firebase + SQL for real-time job management; analytics-driven rating system with SQL + Twilio SMS notifications.

projects.name: LoRA Fine-Tuning
projects.summary: Fine-tuned RoBERTa-base with Low-Rank Adaptation; 94.6% test accuracy with <1M parameters; ranked top 25% on Kaggle leaderboard.

awards.name: Core Team Member
awards.details: Led Web Dev team & technical events (300+ attendees); secured sponsorships from RedBull & GeeksforGeeks.

awards.name: NYU Global Ambassador
awards.details: Represented NYU at prospective student events; supported 100+ attendees with academic & campus queries.

awards.name: Ops Lead — TEDx AISSMS COE
awards.details: Acquired 32% more sponsorships; managed logistics for 200+ participants.

awards.name: 3rd Place — Western Regional Conclave
awards.details: Recognized for presentation on sustainable technologies.

awards.name: Student Coordinator
awards.details: Ran game-building sessions for 200+ participants; sourced guest speakers.
